amendatorysection.catchline: County board; engineers; attorneys; employees; payment from drainage fund.
amendatorysection.para: The county board may employ engineers, attorneys, and others to assist in the administration of sections 31-901 to 31-933. Payment for these services shall be made from the drainage fund except where a particular improvement project is set up, in which case the share of engineering, legal and other costs shall become part of the improvement project's costs and shall be paid therefrom.
